name: 2026 Infrastructure Programme (Detailed)
description: Structured replacement and modernisation of the core infrastructure platform across storage, networking, compute, and VDI.

milestones.title: Infrastructure Readiness (Insentra)
milestones.description: Core stack live, Storage network live, Pure Array 1 live, 3 Hosts live.

tasks.title: PHASE 1: LEGACY REMOVAL & CLEAN-UP
tasks.description: Decommissioning of legacy storage (NAS, Tegile) and clean-up.
tasks.scopeOfWorks: Environment preparation for new core.

tasks.title: 1.1 Archive and Backup Validation
tasks.description: Ensure archive platform is ready before NAS removal.
tasks.scopeOfWorks:
• Confirm archive storage platform is installed and connected to Hyper-V
  • Validate archive storage configuration
  • Validate backup jobs targeting archive storage
  • Validate SharePoint backups
  • Validate Wasabi offsite backups
  • Test sample restores from archive and Wasabi
  • Complete operational handover to Project Admins
  • Obtain formal sign-off that archive platform is production ready

Gate: Archive platform signed off

tasks.title: 1.2 NAS Decommissioning
tasks.scopeOfWorks:
• Confirm no active backups or workloads on NAS
  • Remove NAS repositories from Veeam
  • Disable NAS access credentials
  • Power down NAS units
  • Physically derack NAS unit 1
  • Physically derack NAS unit 2
  • Physically derack NAS unit 3
  • Physically derack NAS unit 4
  • Remove NAS network cabling
  • Remove NAS VLAN references from network

Gate: NAS fully removed

tasks.title: 1.3 Tegile Storage Cleanup
tasks.scopeOfWorks:
• Identify all remaining VM copies on Tegile
  • Identify snapshots and orphaned data
  • Decide retain vs delete per dataset
  • Migrate retained data to Wasabi or alternative storage
  • Delete obsolete VM copies and snapshots
  • Remove Tegile datastores from Hyper-V
  • Remove Tegile iSCSI targets from Hyper-V hosts
  • Remove Tegile MPIO configuration
  • Power down Tegile Volume 6
  • Power down Tegile Volume 16
  • Physically derack Tegile Volume 6
  • Physically derack Tegile Volume 16
  • Remove Tegile storage VLANs

Gate: Tegile fully removed

tasks.title: 1.4 Hyper-V and Network Clean-Up
tasks.scopeOfWorks:
• Remove legacy iSCSI VLANs
  • Remove orphaned vSwitches
  • Remove stale VM network adapters
  • Validate no legacy storage paths remain
  • Validate Hyper-V hosts in clean operational state

Gate: Clean baseline confirmed

tasks.title: PHASE 2: CORE NETWORK STACK DEPLOYMENT
tasks.description: New core install, VLANs, and coexistence setup.

tasks.title: 2.1 Core Stack Installation
tasks.scopeOfWorks:
• Rack new core switches in existing racks
  • Connect dual power feeds
  • Install optics and fibre
  • Configure out-of-band management
  • Keep new core isolated from existing core

Gate: Core hardware operational

tasks.title: 2.2 Core VLAN Configuration
tasks.scopeOfWorks:
• Create Management VLANs
  • Create Server VLANs
  • Create Storage VLANs
  • Create VDI VLANs
  • Create Cluster / Live Migration VLANs
  • Create new logical DMZ VLAN
  • Document VLAN IDs, subnets, gateways

Gate: VLAN configuration validated

tasks.title: 2.3 Firewall Integration
tasks.scopeOfWorks:
• Create uplinks from new core to Palo Alto
  • Configure trunking
  • Configure routing
  • Create firewall zones
  • Validate northâ€“south connectivity
  • Confirm no L2 connectivity between old and new cores

Gate: Firewall connectivity validated

tasks.title: 2.4 Storage Network Deployment
tasks.scopeOfWorks:
• Rack storage switches
  • Connect dual power feeds
  • Configure management
  • Configure storage VLANs
  • Validate storage switch interconnects

Gate: Storage network ready

tasks.title: 2.5 Core Coexistence Configuration
tasks.scopeOfWorks:
• Document old core / new core coexistence design
  • Confirm initial routing via firewall only
  • Plan optional L3 transit link for migration phase
  • Document VLAN cutover approach
  • Confirm no L2 stretching between cores

Gate: Coexistence strategy agreed

tasks.title: PHASE 3: PRIMARY STORAGE & COMPUTE intro
tasks.description: Setup of Pure Storage and new Compute hosts.

tasks.title: 3.1 Compute Pre-Staging (Bolton)
tasks.scopeOfWorks:
• Rack three hosts at Bolton
  • Update firmware and BIOS
  • Install VMware
  • Apply baseline configuration
  • Validate host health

Gate: Hosts ready for DC

tasks.title: 3.2 Compute Install (Data Centre)
tasks.scopeOfWorks:
• Transport hosts to DC
  • Rack hosts
  • Connect to new core
  • Connect to storage switches
  • Validate connectivity

Gate: Hosts live in DC

tasks.title: 3.3 Pure Storage Array 1 Installation
tasks.scopeOfWorks:
• Rack Pure Storage Array 1
  • Connect to storage switches
  • Configure iSCSI
  • Configure MPIO
  • Create initial datastores
  • Validate performance and failover

Gate: Storage ready

tasks.title: 3.4 Attach Compute to Storage
tasks.scopeOfWorks:
• Present Pure datastores to hosts
  • Validate datastore access
  • Validate failover behaviour
  • Confirm readiness for Horizon

Gate: Compute + storage validated

tasks.title: 4.1 Exchange Migration
tasks.scopeOfWorks:
• Create internal VIP
  • Create external VIP (1:1 NAT)
  • Update DNS
  • Test mail flow
  • Remove Exchange services from Kemp

tasks.title: 4.2 Web Services Migration
tasks.scopeOfWorks:
• Configure svr-websites-01 reverse proxy
  • Create firewall NAT rules
  • Test internal and external access
  • Remove web services from Kemp

tasks.title: 4.3 Horizon Temporary LB
tasks.scopeOfWorks:
• Deploy temporary virtual load balancer
  • Repoint existing UAGs
  • Validate Horizon access
  • Remove Kemp from Horizon traffic path

Gate: Kemp no longer in active use

tasks.title: 5.1 Insentra Assessment
tasks.scopeOfWorks:
• Assess existing Horizon deployment
  • Review configuration and performance
  • Identify prerequisites
  • Confirm target architecture

tasks.title: 5.2 Horizon Deployment
tasks.scopeOfWorks:
• Deploy new Connection Servers
  • Deploy Horizon infrastructure components
  • Configure Horizon services
  • Validate functionality

Dependency: 7 March milestone

tasks.title: 5.4 Capacity Step Change
tasks.scopeOfWorks:
• Rack remaining compute hosts
  • Connect to core and storage
  • Add hosts to cluster
  • Validate capacity

tasks.title: 5.5 User Migration (Week 3)
tasks.scopeOfWorks:
• Migrate pilot users
  • Validate user experience
  • Migrate remaining users
  • Monitor stability

tasks.title: 5.6 Horizon Cutover
tasks.scopeOfWorks:
• Set vdi.seddon.co.uk as primary
  • Retain horizon.seddon.co.uk for rollback
  • Decommission legacy Horizon after stability period

tasks.title: 6.1 Pure Array 2 Install
tasks.scopeOfWorks:
• Rack Pure Storage Array 2
  • Connect to storage network
  • Configure replication (if applicable)

tasks.title: 6.2 Production Migration
tasks.scopeOfWorks:
• Migrate server workloads
  • Migrate file services
  • Validate application functionality

tasks.title: 6.3 Legacy Decommissioning
tasks.scopeOfWorks:
• Decommission Kemp appliances
  • Remove physical DMZ switch
  • Remove old core stack (if applicable)
  • Remove unused VLANs and routes
